short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select text to display Wikipedia popups.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WikiSnip provides popups containing Wikipedia descriptions when the user highlights some text. A summary paragraph of the term will appear if an entry for the selected text exists. WikiSnip is an absolute must-have for students and those looking to learn something new!
